content: crochet dad s children grandchildren and wife are sad to announce the passing of crochet dad gene on january 3 2022 we wanted to keep his patterns available for you to use to make beautiful creations for your loved ones--like the ones all of us treasure please know that we will not be able to provide support for these patterns should you have questions if you do make something with one of his patterns and post it to social media please use the #crochetdad hashtag to share with us
